TEXT.S: alang Hbun ga niya mki sku Toweng si atu Hosing Ku, kwara sali buwan nya ga 69 buwan, 180 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 64 kyan ku 116 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 36 kyan ku 64 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Tayan 62 , binah lihuyan s'uli 3 . maki qu ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Hbun hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'zil na Hbun hya' ga . tay mkyahu' na Hbun hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Hbun hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkraya' na Hbun hya' ga Wsilung. tay mkyahu' na Hbun hya' ga Pyasan. rekisi kayal kyokay ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh
